data.description: Explores the spending and tax policies of state and local governments. Focus on factors influencing the mix and level of public spending and the choice of revenue sources. Issues to be studied include the fiscal relations between governments and property tax.
data.title: STATE AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT FINANCE

data.description: The tools and techniques used in the economic approach to policy analysis. Emphasis is on applying these methodological tools to evaluating existing public policies and policy alternatives, as well as providing a deeper understanding of how the economy operates.
data.title: MICROECONOMIC POLICY ANALYSIS
